EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-06-11 Partner Launch - SE Accreditation Promo.ES-2018-06-11 Partner Laun
EmailTemplate.subject: First 50 to Take Sales Engineer Accreditation Course will Receive $100 Amazon Gift Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Congratulations on your Platinum Partner Designation!
As a premier member of our new partner program, we would like to make you aware of a limited promotion we are extending…The first 50 partner reps to take our new Sales Engineer Accreditation courses will receive a $100 Amazon Gift Card!
Our new, online Sales Engineer Accreditation enables you to quickly ramp up on how to sell, position, differentiate and qualify Turbonomic opportunities.
This promotion is extended on a First Come, First Served basis so ACT NOW <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com/]]>!
We strongly believe our new partner program, benefits, discounts, and enablement curriculum will position you and your company for success in this ever-changing and highly competitive Cloud space!
To login, please use your email address as your username and enter the password: Turbonomic2018! (you can change this upon your first login).
<[[https://www.brainshark.com/brainshark/public/login/m/login2.asp?companyid=2852310]]>
Thank you for your continual support. Feel free to reach out to PartnerDesk@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partnerdesk@turbonomic.com]]> should you have any questions.
Sincerely, Chris Gorecki Vice President, Global Channel & Alliances
